welcome.title: Welcome to City Services Help Center!
welcome.description: I can help you with questions about property taxes, revenue services, permits, and other city services.

suggestedQuestions.text: What are the office hours for Revenue Services?
suggestedQuestions.query: What are the office hours for Revenue Services?

suggestedQuestions.text: How do I pay my property taxes?
suggestedQuestions.query: Where can I pay my property taxes?

suggestedQuestions.text: What is the deadline for property tax payments?
suggestedQuestions.query: What is the deadline for property tax payments?
